root: ^Congradulations! Your survavability rating has increased to 87%
^Proceed down the corridor towards the Blast Shelter.
^You may now enter the Blast Shelter and Lock it.
^This action will prevent any individuals from entering for 48 hours.
^Heat scans indicate [4] humans still within the facility.
^Do you wish to act upon this information

c-0: ^I choose to live, not going through that again.
c-1: ^ Prehaps I could help them out.
^I wouldn't mind being the hero of this story.
